title: The new Fiora is insulting. The Fiora rework is harassment. And allot like a satire joke.
body:
From: Riot Games

Hello F3ORA,

"We do not allow the insulting, harassment, or inappropriate satire to others. As such, your post has been deleted and warning has been given."

I don't like to be bullys Riot. 

Every day I am insulted by what you did to my champ the day you banned me from ranked for my amazing skill.

It is insulting what you did to the 1st E-sport. 

It is insulting to gamers.

You nerfed the best player's champ to be a jerk.

I don't like being harassed by developers...

When you destroy her double lunge and give her an ultimate that doesn't even work half the time.

It is satire to think that you even care about the game. 

I don't like being down voted by a legion of negative people who do nothing but pick on me.

Banning me is not how you handle it. 

That is harassment. 

Deleting the topic is bullying. 

Take a look in the mirror.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2hujBpDrS4&t=338s

replies.body: stop looking for attention

> [{quoted}](name=SwaT 10,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KgZsM6gh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-18T09:06:31.125+0000)
>
> stop looking for attention

I'm not going to stop till they reset the rework.
Yea, let's take an opinion from a guy who has an MMR of a Bronze.

Why play ranked when you never get to play the game?  

Why play ranked when as soon as you try to teach teach a new player how to play they report you lose your account like being the Gustapo in Nazi Germany? 

If you aren't a cookie cutter player AKA (good player like me) you are going to get reported for being unorthodox .

By the time you leave bronze you have to make a new account because of this.

Good players...   I challenge any top LCS player and they will lose to me horribly.

I am the best Fiora of all time hands down. 

It's not that I don't know how to adapt to the new Fiora.  I've been playing the game every day for years and have 1000's more games than any of you.

ALL OF YOU COMBINED>

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KgZsM6gh,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-20T21:27:04.626+0000)

He's just going to back off from the challenge by creating an excuse like "LOL HE'S NOT WORTH MY TIME! I CAN BEAT HIM ANYTIME". 

I mean come on. He's not even brave enough to touch a Ranked match.

https://media.tenor.co/images/b0f21fc003ae8752a6529e5fbe2da199/raw

All Bark No Bite.

Fiora is in no way "ruined" at all when she's maintaining a good winrate of 51% & keeping a healthy playrate of 9%. You're just stubborn-headed in not wanting to change your playstyle.

And again, that video you spammed is useless since you're going against non-level 30s & Bronze players. Remind me again why you have a problem with me mentioning about your 3/24/5 Fiora game again...?
